welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tottori, Japan! Get ready to explore the city known for its stunning sand dunes, beautiful coastline, and traditional charm. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: cafe SOURCE (カフェ ソース)
restaurants.description: cafe SOURCE (カフェ ソース) is a café located in 鳥取市.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tottori Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tottori Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
